definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: Mix egg whites and milk. Add seasoning and crab meat and mix well.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白與鮮奶拌勻，加入調味料與蟹肉拌勻。

sentences.english: Currently, we are looking for frozen crab meat.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我們正在尋找急凍蟹肉。

sentences.english: Of policy measures is eat crab after a drink ginger hot red-sugar water.
sentences.chinese: 應對之策就是進食蟹肉後喝一杯生薑紅糖水。

sentences.english: The crabmeat and sashimi are so fresh and juicy that you'd no doubt want to order more.
sentences.chinese: 螃蟹肉和生魚片新鮮且多汁，你當然希望多多益善了。

sentences.english: Fried crabmeat is always a favorite with our customers.
sentences.chinese: 炒蟹肉一向爲我們的顧客所特別喜愛。

sentences.english: Company specialized in the processing of crabmeat.
Australian rock lobster with timbale of green vegetable, crabmeat, caviar and bell pepper coulis.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲龍蝦配蔬菜撻，蟹肉，魚子醬及甜椒汁。

sentences.english: Mix crabmeat with all ingredients together.
sentences.chinese: 蟹肉與全部材料拌勻成餡料。

sentences.english: I think I'll start with a crabmeat salad and then half a dozen clams.
sentences.chinese: 我想先來點蟹肉色拉，再來六個蛤蜊肉。

sentences.english: Crad Meat and Caviar, Hoem Smoked Scallop, Tataki Tuna Fish.
sentences.chinese: 蟹肉魚子醬，自制核桃木薰乾貝，霜燒鮪魚。

sentences.english: Broccoli with crabmeat sauce is very popular in our restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 蟹肉西蘭花在我們餐廳非常受歡迎。

sentences.english: It is quite a long time since we received your last order for crabmeat .
sentences.chinese: 自接上次蟹肉訂單以來，已過去相當長的時間。

sentences.english: After eating crab roe, you can eat crab meat.
sentences.chinese: 喫完蟹黃就該喫蟹肉了。

sentences.english: She can get crab meat out fast and with minimum waste.
sentences.chinese: 她能夠快速剝出蟹肉而將浪費降到最低。

sentences.english: The more luxurious versions often have crab meat and a topping of crab roe.
sentences.chinese: 昂貴的配料通常是蟹肉和蟹黃。

definition: the ovaries, roe and digestive tract of the crab/soft interior of crab as a food delicacy/crab meat
umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
the cylindrical adductor muscle of bivalve shellfish such as scallops
